# ct-slider

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                     | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disables the slider                                             | `boolean` | `false` |
| `value`    | `value`    | The value of the slider The value is a number between 0 and 100 | `number`  | `0`     |
